assertions.assertion: The function int hthread_cond_broadcast(hthread_cond_t *cond); shall unblock all threads, hardware or software, currently blocked on the specified condition variable cond.
When each thread unblocked as a result of a pthread_cond_broadcast() returns from its call to pthread_cond_wait(), the thread shall own the mutex with which it called pthread_cond_wait().
If successful, the pthread_cond_broadcast() function shall return zero;
